title: Yuan Dynasty History of the Song-SAQ

content.question: In your response, be sure to address all parts of the question. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable. Use the passage to answer all parts of the question that follows. a) Identify ONE claim made in the passage about the policies of Chinese rulers. b) Identify ONE way the passage illustrates the economic development of China under the Song dynasty.

topic.text: 1.1: Developments in East Asia from c. 1200 to c. 1450

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
